title: LF Support Duo

replies.body:
Im lvl 28 on Oceania right now but i have two other accounts on Eu West/East. Just lvl new account after I moved to Nz, so I will play normals until im lvl 30 and then play ranked, and ive played a good amount as support before! 

Ive added u, my ingame name is Dumbledour
Diamond 1 support, can play some games with you on a d3 smurf if you like :)
